name: @phs-santos/sipjs-simple
description: Abstração simplificada do SIP.js para projetos WebRTC.

scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:patch: npm run build && npm version patch -m "chore(release): %s" && git push origin main --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && npm version minor -m "chore(release): %s" && git push origin main --tags
scripts.release:major: npm run build && npm version major -m "chore(release): %s" && git push origin main --tags
scripts.release:beta: npm run build && npm version prerelease --preid=beta -m "chore(release): %s" && git push origin main --tags

author: Paulo Henrique Souza <paulo18santos2000@gmail.com>
